page.title: 08A POPULAR STREET GAME.
page.content: A popular game locally is called 40.40.in. To play you need four or more players. You choose a post and a person to be 'on' and that person counts to 40 at the post while the others hide. After having counted to 40 the person who is on looks for the others, and if they see anyone they run back to the post and shout,"40.40. in, I see xx hiding at such and such a place." The first person caught is then the person who is on next time. To avoid being on any of the players can run undiscovered to the post and call, "40.40.in.", and so guaranteeing that they will not be chosen to be "on" next time.
